section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor may issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-189, see Mayor’s Order 86-62, April 22, 1986.
Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-189, see Mayor’s Order 86-62, April 22, 1986.
